chapter.text: Ta su~in mimu
Kore wa meiryona keiten no shirushidearu
Kare-ra ga shinja ni narou to shinai tame, anata wa tabun, shinuhodo kuno shite iru kotodearou
Moshi ware ga sono tsumori to nari, ten kara shirushi o kudaseba, kare-ra wa sore ni osoreitte kenkyo ni narudearou
Daga, jihibukaki okata kara kare-ra ni atarashi kunkai ga motarasa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa itsumo somuki saru
Kare-ra wa (sore o) usodearu to suru.Daga ima ni sono guro suru koto ga, shinjitsu to natte, kare-ra ni furikakaru nodearu
Kare-ra wa, ka no daichi o minai no ka. Ikaga ni oku no, subete no totoi mono o, ware wa soko de sodateru ka o
Hontoni sono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okatadearu
Anata no omo ga musa ni yobikake, ko ose rareta toki o omoi nasai. `Fuhona min no moto ni ike
Firuaun no min no moto ni. Kare-ra wa omo o osorenai no ka
Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi no omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi o uso-tsuki yobawari suru koto o osore ma su
Watashi no mune wa appaku sa re, mata watashi no shita wa motsuremasu. Desukara harun o, noko washi (tasuke)te kudasai
Mata (sono Jo) kare-ra wa, watashi ni tsumi o ka shite irunode, watashi o korosu no o osoremasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Kesshite sode wanai. Anata gata ryonin wa, waga shirushi o motte ike. Hontoni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni ite, kiite iru nodearu
Sorede anata gata ryonin wa, firuaun no moto ni itte itte yaru ga i. “Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yu no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shitodearukara
Isuraeru no shison o, watashi-tachi to issho ni ika sete kudasai” to
Kare wa itta. `Anata wa yosho no toki, watashi-tachi no ma de sodate raretade wanai ka. Anata no shogai no oku no nengetsu o, watashi-tachi no ma de sugoshitade wanai ka
Sorenanoni anata wa hidoi koto o shidekashita monoda. Anata wa onwowasureru-sha no nakamadearu
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Watashi ga, sore o okonatta no wa jado ni fumi mayotte ita toki no kotodearu
Sorede watashi wa osoroshiku natte, anata gatakara nige dashita. Daga,-nushi wa watashi ni chishiki o sazukete, shito no hitori to nasa reta nodearu
Anata wa Isuraeru no shison o dorei to shite okinagara, sore ga watashi ni koi o shimesu onkeidearu to demo iu nodesu ka
Firuaun wa itta. `Ban'yu no omo to wa, nandesuka
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no yu no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi (kore o) satottanaraba
Kare (firuaun) wa, sayu no mono ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata wa kikimashita ka
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Anata gata no shu, mata mukashikara no anata gata no sosen no omode mo ara remasu
Kare (firuaun wa sayu no mono ni) itta. `Anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kono shito wa, hontoni kichigaidesu
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Azuma to nishi, mata sonoaida ni aru ban'yu no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi rikai suru nodeareba
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata ga, moshi watashi igai ni kami o taterunaraba, watashi wa kanarazu anata o shujin ni surudeshou
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Watashi ga moshi, meihakuna nanimono ka o, anata ni motarashite modesu ka
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata no iu koto ga hontonara, sore o shimeshi nasai
Sorede (musa) wa tsue o nageta. Miruga i. Sore wa akiraka ni hebi to naru
Mata kare no tewosashinoberu to, miruga i. Sore wa dare ga mite mo masshirodearu
Kare (firuaun) wa sayu no choro-tachi ni itta. `Hontoni kore wa, roren'na majutsu-shidearu
Kare wa sono majutsu de, anata gata o kono kuni kara oidasou to shite iru. Sorede anata gata wa do shiyo to iu no ka
Kare-ra wa itta. ` (Hisashiku) kare to sono kyodai o taiki sa se, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni noko washi
subete no roren'na majutsu-shi o anata no moto ni meshidasa reyo
Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, kimerareta-bi no kimerareta jikoku ni atsume rareta
Mata minshu ni mukatte mo,`anata gata wa (zenbu) shugo shita no ka.' To tsuge rareta
(Hitobito wa iu. ) `Majutsu-shi no kata ga kateba, watashi-tachi wa kare-ra (no oshie) ni shitagaoude wanaidesu ka
Majutsu-shi-tachi wa yattekurunari, firuaun ni itta. `Watashi-tachi ga kateba, kanarazu hobi ga arudeshou ka
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Mochirondearu. So no baai anata gata wa, kanarazu sokkin to narou
Musa wa kare-ra ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata no nageru mono o, nage nasai
Sokode kare-ra wa, nawa to tsue o nagete itta. `Firuaun no o iko ni chikai kete, watashi-tachi wa kanarazu shori-sha ni narou
Sonotoki musa ga tsue o nageru to, miruga i. Sore wa kare-ra no netsuzo shita mono o, nomikonde shimatta
Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, satto fushi sajida shite
itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yu no omo o shinjimasu
Musa to harun no omo o

Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata gata wa, watashi no yurushi mo enai uchi ni kare o shinjiru no ka. Kitto kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta, anata gata no shuchodearou. Daga, yagate omoishirudearou. Watashi wa kanarazu anata gata no te to ashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shi, anata gata o, subete haritsuke no kei ni surudearou
Kare-ra wa itta. `Kamaimasen. Watashi-tachi wa, jibun no omo no moto ni kaeru dakedesukara
Watashi-tachi no negai wa, tada-nushi ga, watashi-tachi no kazukazu no ayamachi o yurusa re, watashi-tachi ga shinja-tachi no sakigake ni naru kotodesu
Ware wa musa ni,`waga shimo be-tachi to issho ni, yoru no ma ni tabidate. Anata gata wa kanarazu otte ga kakarudearou.' To keiji shita
Sonotoki firuaun wa, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni tsukawashi
(iwa seta) `korera no mono wa, hon'no shosu no mure ni suginai nodesu
Kare-ra wa, watashi-tachi ni hara o tatete irudeshouga
watashi-tachi wa, keikai o totonoe, gunzei mo oi nodesu
Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o kaju-en ya izumi kara oidashi
zaiho ya eiyo aru chii kara tsuiho shita
Son'na shidaideatta. Soshite ware wa Isuraeru no shison-tachi ni, korera no mono o (soto no tokoro de) tsuga seta
Sate kare-ra (firuaun no gunzei) wa hinode no toki, kare-ra o otte kita
Ryosha ga tagaini sugata ga mieru yo ni naru to, musa no nakama wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, kanarazu oitsuka rerudearou
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Kesshite, kesshite. Hontoni omo wa watashi to tomoni ora remasu. Sugu ni onmichibiki ga arudeshou
Sonotoki, ware wa musa ni keiji shita. `Anata no tsue de umi o ute.' Suruto sore wa wakaretaga, sorezore no wareta bubun wa kyodaina yama no yodeatta
Ware wa mata,-gai no gun o soko ni obiki konda
Soshite ware wa, musa soshite kare to tomoni ita hitobito subete o sukutta
Daga hoka no mono-tachi o, obore saseta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru
Iburahimu no monogatari o kare-ra ni katari nasai
Kare ga chichioya to kare no hitobito ni mukatte,`anata gata wa nani o suhai suru nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa guzo o suhai shi, itsumo kore ni tsukaeru nodesu
Kare wa itta. `Anata gata ga inoru toki kare-ra (guzo) wa kiku no ka
Mata kare-ra (guzo) wa, anata gata o ekisuru nodesu ka, soretomo gaisuru nodesu ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi no sosen ga, koshite iru no o mita nodesu
Kare wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, anata gataga ima made suhai shite kita mono ni tsuite kangaete mita nodesu ka
Anata gata mo, mukashi no sosen-tachi mo (suhai shite ita mono ni tsuite)
Ban'yu no omo o nozoite wa, kare-ra wa watashi no tekidesu
Kare wa watashi o tsukura reta kata de, watashi o michibika re
watashi ni shokuryo o shikyu shi, mata inryo o sadzuke rareta okata
Mata byoki ni nareba, kare wa watashi o iyashite kudasaimasu
Watashi o shina se, sorekara ikikaera se rareru okata
Shinpan no hi ni wa, zaika o o yurushi kudasa reru yo, watashi ga negai nozomu katadearu
Omo yo, eichi o watashi ni sazuke, tadashi-sha-tachi no nakama ni irete kudasai
Watashi o atoato no yo made shinjitsu o tsutaeta mono to shite kudasai
Watashi o shifuku no en o tsugu mono ni nasa re
watashi no chichi o o yurushi kudasai. Hontoni kare wa mayotta mono no nakamadesuga
Mata (hitobito ga) fukkatsu sa se rareru hi ni, watashi no menboku o ushinawa senaide kudasai
Sonohi ni wa, zaiho mo musuko-tachi mo, yakudachimasen
Tada yogore no nai kokoro o, arra ni bo-geru mono dake wa betsudesuga
Rakuen wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni chikadzuke rare
jado ni mayotta mono ni wa, hi goku ga arawareyou
Soshite kare-ra wa iwa reyou. `Anata gataga, agamete ita (kamigami) wa doko ni iru nodesu ka
Arra o soto ni shite (hai shite ita mono) wa anata gata o tasuke rareru nodesu ka, matawa jibun jishin o tasuke rareru nodesu ka
Sokode kare-ra mo yuwaku shita-sha-tachi mo, sono naka ni nagekoma reru
Mata iburisu (akuma) no gunzei mo zenbu issho ni
Kare-ra wa soko de, koron shite iudearou
Arra ni chikatte iimasu. Watashi-tachi wa akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodesu
Ban'yu no omo to doi ni, anata gata o hai shita nodesukara
Watashi-tachi o mayowa seta no wa, tsumibukaimono-tachi nihokanaranai
Sorede watashi-tachi ni wa, dare mo torinasu mono mo naku
hitori no shin no tomo mo nai nodesu
Watashi-tachi ga moichido kaeru koto ga dekirunara, hontoni shinja no nakama ni hairu nodesuga
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru
Nufu no min mo, shito-tachi o shinjinakatta
Kare-ra no doho no nufu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa,-nushi o osorenai nodesu ka
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Sore de arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa, sore ni taishi anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Kare-ra wa itta. `Mottomo iyashi-sha-tachi ga anata ni shitagatte iru to iu no ni, watashi-tachi made anata o shinjiru nodesu ka
Kare (nufu) wa itta. `Kare-ra ga okonatte iru koto ni tsuite, watashi ga nani o shirimashou ka
Kare-ra no seisan wa, tada watashi no omo ni zokusuru nodesu. Moshi anata gataga rikai surunaraba
Mata watashi wa, shinko suru mono-tachi o oiharaimasen
Watashi wa komeina hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai nodesu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga tomenainara, nufu yo, kanarazu ishi-uchi ni sa rerudeshou
Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, hontoni watashi no min wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to moshimasu
Sorede watashi to kare-ra no ma o, shikkari o sabaki kudasare, watashi to, watashi to issho no shinja-tachi o sukutte kudasai
Sokode ware wa kare to, kare to issho no mono-tachi o, mansai shita fune no naka ni sukutte yatta
Sorekara ware wa ato ni nokotta-sha-tachi o obore saseta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru
Ado (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Kare-ra no doho no fudo ga kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Mata watashi wa, kono koto de anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Anata gata wa kochi to iu kochi ni itazura ni ishibumi o tateru nodesu ka
Mata anata gata wa (eien ni) sumou to shite, kengona koro o tateru nodesu ka
Anata gata wa boryoku o fuu toki, bogyaku-sha no yo ni furumau nodesu ka
Arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Anata gata ga shiru hodo no mono o, sadzuke rareru-kata o osore nasai
Kare wa kazukazu no kachiku to shison o, anata gata ni sadzuke rare
mata kaju-en ya izumi o mo sadzuke rareta
Watashi wa anata gata ni kuwae rareru idaina hi no chobatsu o hontoni osoreru
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga sekkyo shite mo sekkyo shinakute mo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji kotodesu
Hontoni kore wa, mukashi no yarikata ni sotonarimasen
Watashi-tachi wa chobatsu sa renai nodesu
Kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sokode ware wa kare-ra o horoboshita. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru
Samudo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Kare-ra no doho sarifu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomenai. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Anata gata wa koko de, itsu made mo antaide i raremashou ka
Kaju-en ya izumi
kokumotsu hata ya, migotona waka mi o tsukeru natsumeyashi no en
mata (iwa) yama ni, anata gataga takumi ni ie o kiri ugatte mo (antaideari eyou ka)
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Anata gata wa, muhona jokiwoisshita-sha no meirei ni, shitagatte wa narimasen
Kare-ra wa chijo ni kigai o hikiokosu mono de,(akuhei o) kyosei suru monode wa arimasen
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen
Anata wa, watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Anata no iu no ga hontonara, watashi-tachi ni shirushi o motarashi nasai
Kare (sarifu) wa itta. `Koko ni itto no mesu rakuda ga imasu. Soreni mo mizunomi-bi ga ari, mata anata gata ni mo,(sorezore) kimerareta mizunomi-bi ga arimasu
Idaina-bi no chobatsu ga anata gata o osowanai yo, soreni gai o kuwaete wa narimasen
Daga kare-ra wa, sono ken o kitte fugu ni shi, tachimachi kokai suru koto ni natta
Sore wa chobatsu ga kare-ra o osottakaradearu. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru
Ruto no min mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Doho ruto ga, kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, daredare ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Anata gata wa sozo sa reta mono no naka otoko dake ni chikadzuki
nushi ga anata gata no tame ni tsukura reta haigusha o kaeriminai nodesu ka. Iya, anata gata wa tsumiwookasu-shadesu
Kare-ra wa (kotaete) itta. `Ikagen tomenainara, ruto yo, anata wa kanarazu tsuiho sa rerudeshou
Kare (ruto wa) itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni anata gata no okonai o imikiratte imasu
Omo yo, watashi to watashinokazoku o, kare-ra no shogyo kara o sukui kudasai
Sorede ware wa, kare to kare no kazoku o subete sukutta
Ato ni nokotta, rojo (ruto no tsuma) wa betsudeattaga
Sore kara, ware wa soto no mono o horoboshita
Ware wa,(-seki no) ame o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta. Keikoku sa rete ita-sha-tachi ni wa, saiyaku no amedeatta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaki jihibukaki okata de ara reru
Mori no hitobito mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Shuaibu ga kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomenai. Watashi e no hoshu wa, ii ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Keiryo o jubun ni atae, son o sa sete wa narimasen
Seikakuna ase de hakari
tanin no mono o sashu shite wa narimasen. Mata meiwaku o oyobosu okonai o shite, chijo o taihai sa sete wa narimasen
Anata gata to mae no sedai no mono-tachi o tsukura reta kata, kare o osore nasai
Suru to kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen
Anata wa watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Do kangaete mo anata wa kyogen no todesu
Anata no iu koto ga shinjitsunara, ten'noikkaku o watashi-tachi no ue ni otoshi nasai
Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Watashi no omo wa, anata gata no suru koto o yoku shitte ora remasu
Daga kare-ra wa kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sorede ano insan'na hi no chobatsu ga kare-ra o osotta. Sore wa hontoni kibishi chobatsu no hideatta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru
Hontoni kono (kuruan) wa, ban'yu no nushi kara no keijidearu
Seijitsuna seirei ga sore o tazusae
anatanokokoroni (kudashita). Sorede anata wa keikoku-sha no 1-ri to naru tame ni
meiryona Arabia no kotoba de (kudasa reta nodearu)
Kono koto wa, sudeni mukashi no keiten no naka ni shirusa rete iru
Isuraeru no shison no gakusha-tachi ga kore o shitte iru koto wa, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) ni totte, hitotsu no shirushide wa nai no ka
Ware ga, moshi kore o Arabu igai no dareka ni keiji shitanaraba
kare ga sore o dokuju shite mo, hitobito wa sore o shinjinakattadearou
Kono yo ni, ware wa tsumibukaimono-tachi no kokoronouchi ni, sore (keiji no ichibu) o haira seta
Sore demo kare-ra wa itamashi chobatsu o miru made wa, kono (kuruan) o shinjinaidearou
Daga sono (chobatsu) wa, kare-ra no kidzukanai-chu ni totsuzen osoikakarudearou
Sonotoki kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa yuyo sa renai nodesu ka' to iou
Sore demo kare-ra wa, ware no chobatsu o isoga seyou to iu no ka
Anata wa do omou no ka, ware ga kare-ra ni iku-nenkan mo (no gense no seikatsu o) kyoraku sa sete mo
nao, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta koto (tenbatsu) ga kuru to sureba
kyoraku sa sete moratta koto ga, kare-ra ni tori nani no eki ni narou ka
Ware wa keikoku-sha o (maemotte) tsukawasazu ni ikan naru machi mo horobosanakatta
(Mata) kidzuka se (ta nochi de) nakereba. Ware wa kesshite futona koto o okonau monode wanai
Mata akuma-tachi ga kore (keiji) o motarasu koto mo nai nodearu
Sore wa kare-ra ni fusawashi monode mo naku, mata kare-ra ni wa (son'na) noryoku mo nai
Kare-ra wa, keiji o kiku koto kara tozake rarete iru
Sore de arra to issho ni,-gai no don'na kami ni mo inotte wa naranai.-Sa mo nai to anata mo chobatsu sa reru mono no nakama to narou
Anata no kinshin-sha ni chikai Tsuge shi nasai
Mata anata ni shitagatte shinko suru mono ni wa,(ai no) tsubasa o yasashiku sagete yari nasai
Kare-ra ga anata ni shitagawanainara,`anata gata ga okonau koto wa, watashi ni kakawari wa arimasen.' To itte yaru ga i
Iryoku narabinaku jihibukaki okata ni (ato wa) o makase shi nasai
Anata ga (reihai ni) tatsu no o mite ora reru kata ni
mata sajida suru mono-tachi no ma de no, anata no sho dosa o (mo mite ora reru kata ni)
Hontoni kare wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru
Ware wa, akuma-tachi ga dare no ue ni kudaru no ka anata gata ni tsugeyou ka
Kare-ra wa, subete no uso-tsuki no to no ue ni kudaru
(Akuma no hanashi ni) mimiwokasu (-sha) no oku wa uso-tsuki no todearu
Mata shijin-tachi no kotodaga,(akuma ni) 唆 Ka sa reta-sha-tachi (dake) ga, kare-ra ni shitagau
Anata wa, kare-ra ga subete no tanima o samayoi aruku no o minakatta no ka
Mata kare-ra wa, jibun no okonai mo shinai koto o kuchi ni surude wanai ka

Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono, mata arra o oku 唱念 Shi, hakugai sa reta nochi ni wa mizukara o mamoru mono wa betsudearu. Fugi o itta-sha-tachi wa, don'na kawari-kata de, utsurikawatte iku ka o, yagate shiru koto ni narou
